SEOTools is a package for Laravel 5+ and Lumen that provides helpers for some common SEO techniques.

Defender is a Access Control List (ACL) Solution for Laravel. With security and usability in mind, this project aims to provide you a safe way to control your application access without losing the fun of coding.
